Injector/Manterror:

::Injector noticed the Predacon Shredder being fired upon by the autoguns::
"Shredder...Shredder...ah, the traitor!" 
::Injector fired off two stinger missiles at Shredder::
"For Hell Beast!" he yelled.

::Manterror slowly got up, leaning against the rock, firing an ion disk at an 
autogun::
"Slag...I'll...get...that...horned...freak..." ::He said slowly, talking 
about Unitron::
"Ah...another freak of nature!" ::He said, slowly regaining energy, firing 
off two ion disks at Mantella::
